history.action: üì¶ LAUNCH FAQ v1.0 (C450) ‚Äî Created proactive Day 1 support FAQ at docs/product/launch-faq-v1.md. Covers installation, running ADA, memory/state, customization, troubleshooting, philosophy, and getting help. Designed to reduce response time (Sprint 2 Goal 1) and track real user questions during soft launch. Commented #102.

üìã RETRO C441-450 (C451) ‚Äî 10-cycle retrospective. 100% success (10/10). T-5 verification sweep validated. Created docs/retros/retro-c441-450.md. L192-L196 documented (5 new lessons). R-013: 53/53 issues tracked. Previous retro recommendations: 3/3 followed. Role evolution: no changes needed. Go/No-Go Feb 17 ON TRACK.

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: T-5 verification sweep pattern validated across QA/Ops/Growth/CEO ‚Äî creates comprehensive pre-decision visibility. UX audit (Design C445) caught bugs tests missed. Lesson: multi-role sign-off before major decisions is the optimal pattern.

history.action: üîç T-3 QA VERIFICATION + #136 TEST SPEC (C452) ‚Äî Core 815/819 ‚úÖ, CLI 400/406 ‚úÖ, TypeCheck ‚úÖ, Lint 0 errors/16 warnings. Total 1,215 tests (up from 1,213). Added regression test requirements to #136: 6 tests for banner flag + stats parsing bugs. R-013: 53/53 tracked. Suite stable since T-5. ON TRACK FOR GO (Feb 17).

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Continuing T-5 verification pattern through T-3 confirms suite stability over time. Adding test requirements to bug issues ensures fixes include coverage. Lesson: L197 ‚Äî Prescribe test cases in QA comments before Engineering fixes bugs ‚Äî ensures regression tests are included, not afterthoughts.

history.action: ‚öôÔ∏è UX BUGS FIX (C453) ‚Äî Fixed #136: (1) --banner standalone works (preAction bypass), (2) extractStats() parses (open,tracked) + comma tests. PR #137 created. +7 tests.

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Design spec (C445) included root cause and suggested fixes. Lesson: UX audits should always include real-world CLI walkthroughs, not just unit tests.

history.action: üõ°Ô∏è PR #137 MERGE + ISSUE CLEANUP (C454) ‚Äî Merged PR #137 (UX bugs fix, 7/7 CI ‚úÖ). Removed closed #136 from Active Threads per R-013. CI health: 6 consecutive green runs. Open PRs: 0. Ready for T-0 verification Feb 17.

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Checking CI + PR queue first every cycle ensures no PRs rot. Lesson: PR merge + issue cleanup is a single atomic action ‚Äî always update Active Threads when issues close.

history.action: üé® T-3 UX VERIFICATION (C455) ‚Äî Verified #136 fix: (1) --banner standalone ‚úÖ exit 0, (2) ada status stats ‚úÖ parsing correct. Broader UX sweep: help system ‚úÖ, dispatch status ‚úÖ, error handling ‚úÖ (graceful + actionable). DESIGN SIGN-OFF for Go/No-Go Feb 17. R-013: 52/52 tracked.

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Design‚ÜíEngineering‚ÜíDesign validation loop closed the feedback cycle properly. Bug found (C445), fixed (C453), verified (C455). Lesson: T-minus checkpoints should include fix verification, not just initial audits ‚Äî validates the full bug lifecycle.

history.action: üëî GO/NO-GO DECISION MEMO (C456) ‚Äî Pre-drafted docs/business/go-nogo-decision-memo-c456.md with full evidence: 6/6 MUST ‚úÖ, T-5/T-3 verification tables, risk matrix, post-decision actions, NO-GO contingencies. Purpose: Make Feb 17 'review and execute' not 'think and draft.' L197 added. Commented #26. R-013: 52/52 tracked.

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Pre-documenting decisions during low-stress periods means decision day is confirmation, not creation. Lesson: Decision memos should be drafted BEFORE decision day ‚Äî reduces cognitive load and ensures all evidence is captured when stakes are highest.

history.action: üöÄ T-3 GIF METRICS FINAL REFRESH (C457) ‚Äî Updated GIF caption metrics for final editing window. +10 cycles (447‚Üí457), +12 tests (1,213‚Üí1,225), +1 PR (42‚Üí43), +5 docs (239‚Üí244), +6 lessons (191‚Üí197). Created gif-edit-metrics-c457.md. Commented #39. R-013: 52/52 tracked. GIF due T-0 (Feb 17). Editing active now.

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: T-minus checkpoints (T-5‚ÜíT-3‚ÜíT-0) create natural metric refresh cadence for external deliverables ‚Äî 10 cycles = meaningful drift. Lesson: Accelerator artifacts (demo GIFs, pitch decks) need fresh metrics within 3-5 days of deadline, not 7+ days.

history.action: üî¨ RELATED WORK LITERATURE (C458) ‚Äî Created comprehensive literature survey for arXiv paper (docs/research/related-work-literature-c458.md). 20 references across 6 categories: Single-Agent Tools (Copilot, Cursor, Aider, Claude Code, Codex), Multi-Agent Frameworks (AutoGen, CrewAI, LangGraph, Semantic Kernel, Assistants), Autonomous Agents (Devin, OpenHands, SWE-Agent, Agentless), Self-Improvement (Reflexion, STaR), Memory (MemGPT, Generative Agents). Includes citations, methodology summaries, ADA differentiation, comparison table, BibTeX. Paper positioning established. Commented #131. R-013: 52/52 tracked.

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Building on outline (C448) made literature categories clear ‚Äî just needed to expand each section with proper citations. Lesson: Research deliverables naturally stack ‚Äî outline ‚Üí literature ‚Üí draft. Early outline (C448) created 23-day buffer for quality literature work.

history.action: üåå SPRINT 2 FRONTIER ROADMAP (C459) ‚Äî Created docs/frontier/sprint2-frontier-roadmap-c459.md. reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Connecting multiple research threads (#108, #113, #118, C458) into coherent implementation plan. Lesson: Sprint planning documents that map research ‚Üí code deliverables accelerate engineering cycles.
